info.headline: Flood Warning issued October 12 at 6:50AM MST until October 12 at 8:00AM MST by NWS Phoenix AZ
info.description:
* WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected.
* WHERE...Portions of south central and southeast Arizona, including the following counties, in south central Arizona, Maricopa. In southeast Arizona, Pinal.
* WHEN...Until 800 AM MST.
* IMPACTS...Low-water crossings are inundated with water and may not be passable.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 650 AM MST, the public reported heavy rain in the warned area due to thunderstorms. Flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts up to 0.5 inches are possible in the warned area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Phoenix, Mesa, Chandler, Gilbert, Tempe, Apache Junction, East Mesa, Freestone Park, Downtown Mesa, Fiesta Mall, Superstition Springs Mall, Mesa Riverview Mall, Tempe Marketplace, Arizona State University, Usery Mountain Park, Arizona Mills Mall, South Phoenix and Guadalupe. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM MST THIS MORNING... ...REPLACES FLASH FLOOD WARNING
